TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現使用作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的進度列控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a progress bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製進度列，請使用或是方法來繪製的空白列，然後再使用或方法來繪製填滿的列中的項目。To draw a progress bar, use the or methods to draw the empty bar, and then use the or methods to draw the elements that fill in the bar. 如果作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的進度列。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the progress bar with the current visual style. 否則，方法和屬性，這個類別會擲回。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目， ， ，和類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the , , , and classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用自訂控制項和方法來繪製垂直進度列。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a vertical progress bar. 控制項使用每秒重繪新增的片段進度列。The control uses a to redraw the progress bar with an added piece each second. `SetupProgressBar`方法會使用和; 屬性來計算每個繪製的過大矩形的高度。The `SetupProgressBar` method uses the and properties to calculate the height of each progressively larger rectangle that is drawn. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

span.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

value.span: 像素為單位，進度列的每一個內部片段之間的間距寬度。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值取決於作業系統的目前視覺化樣式。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 之前存取這個屬性，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷每個矩形，表示所繪製的進度列遞增的大小方法。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.

exception.span: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.

span.span: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.

exception.span: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

span.span: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所繪製每個進度列片段跨越的高度`bounds`參數。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the height of the `bounds` parameter. 繪製進度列片段的數目取決於寬度`bounds`和所傳回的值和屬性。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the width of `bounds` and the values returned by the and properties. 之前使用此方法，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.
